channel.title: Need Help!
channel.description: ok, i want to make a moparscape PK server that can run 24/7 and make it so that u cna only pk in wildy, i want it to be like, u atk dummies for atk xp, doors for str and hay bails for def. i also want to find out how to add shops, like the pure shop and sutff, i want to be able to have ancients at the NORMAL level needed, and have all skills max of 99 to make it like real rs. can any1 help?

item.title: Need Help!
item.dc:creator: @shadow235 shadow235
item.description:
@shadow235 wrote:

Okay, Download basically Testscape, it has most of those features and for the shops go read up on some tutorials in the Tutorials Section

Read full topic
